name: 謝佳玲
objective: This course is designed to help students develop English reading skills in a meaningful way. Through group discussion and in-class activities, students obtain training in the practical use of English, and also get acquainted with various aspects of American culture. Students need to preview the lessons and get ready to present their views at class. The teacher's instruction focuses on explaining vocabulary usage, analyzing sentence structures, helping students with their oral presentation, and improving their reading comprehension.
